markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lesser Enhance Venom](/Feats.aspx?ID=4022) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vishkanya" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=369" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 61</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Envenom](/Actions.aspx?ID=1451)

</column>

---

Your venom grows deadlier and more plentiful. You upgrade the vishkanyan venom you can apply with Envenom to lesser vishkanyan venom. Envenom's frequency becomes once per hour.

 **Lesser Vishkanyan Venom** (level 1) **Saving Throw** Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 3** 2d6 poison damage (1 round)

<title level="2">Lesser Enhance Venom leads to...</title>
[Moderate Enhance Venom](/Feats.aspx?ID=4030)
name: Lesser Enhance Venom
